Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes set a career-high with 20 points in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks struggled without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving, and their defense couldn't contain Cleveland's offense
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brandon Williams was signed over other players like Jaden Hardy, and Spencer Dinwiddie had an off-game with 2 points on 1/7 shooting
